item.title: WTF is up with all these Tech Layoffs? Is the Economy Finally Impacting Open Source? Ep15
item.description: Transcription Chapters: 00:00:00 On Today’s Episode 00:00:38 WTF is Happening 00:04:50 A Bad business model or correction? 00:07:34 Is this a result of the growth at all costs mentality? 00:11:49 Is this like the previous .com booms and busts? 00:13:55 Are open source developers taking the brunt of layoffs? 00:17:09 Open source companies seeing layoffs as well 00:20:35 Maybe starting focuing on efficiency and profitability before layoffs? 00:22:01 Slow growth or fast growth 00:24:47 The incubator team 00:28:30 Freemium vs open source models 00:31:01 Other budget cuts to events, sponsorships, budgets 00:33:02 More layoff news from the web: meta, Twillio 00:33:19 Core JS Discussion 00:35:16 Open Source Lawsuites?
item.content:
Transcription
